info.summary:
Jayant R. Haritsa works as a Senior Professor in Dept. of Computational & Data Sciences,Indian Institute of Science, and his\her h-index is 37, g-index is 74. His\Her interests are :
 Database System; Real Time; Concurrency Control; Indexation; Query Optimization;
